com.deltaxml.api

Class DeltaXMLException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.deltaxml.api.DeltaXMLException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeltaXMLProcessingException, DXPConfigurationException, PDConfigurationException, PipelinedComparatorException, XMLCombinerConfigurationException, XMLComparatorConfigurationException

    public class DeltaXMLException
extends java.lang.Exception

    This class specifies an exceptional condition.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
